official-title.#text: To amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to require certain health insurance premium increase information submitted to the Secretary of Health and Human Services be disclosed to Congress.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 2794(b) of the Public Health Service Act

header.#text: Disclosure to Congress of certain health insurance premium increase information

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: or this subsection, not later than 30 days after the date of receipt of such information (or, in the case of information submitted before the date of the enactment of this paragraph for the plan year 2015, not later than 30 days after such date of enactment), the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Ways and Means of the House of Representatives

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: a report containing such information presented according to the following categories of health care consumers:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions of the Senate

text.#text: In the case of any information (including justification) relating to premium increases that is submitted for the 2015 plan year or a subsequent plan year to the
A category representing self-only coverage for a single, nonsmoking male who is 30 years of age.
A category representing self-only coverage for a single, smoking male who is 30 years of age.
A category representing self-only coverage for a single, nonsmoking female who is 30 years of age.
A category representing self-only coverage for a single, smoking female who is 30 years of age.
A category representing family coverage for a family of four, including two parents who are each 40 years of age.
A category representing family coverage for a couple consisting of two individuals who are each 55 years of age.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4633 IH: Insurance Rate Transparency Act
